uk.ac.ox.cs.diadem.webapi.css

Interface StyledOverlayBuilder


  • public interface StyledOverlayBuilder
    Builder to construct overlays in DOMWindow, to display informations
    Author:
    Giovanni Grasso (giovannigrasso@gmail.com) Oxford University, Department of Computer Science

    • Nested Class Summary

      • addNode

        StyledOverlayBuilder addNode(StyledNode parent,
                             StyledNode node)
        Add a node as child of another one. If the parent node is not already part of the tree, it is added as root.
        Parameters:
        parent - the parent node
        node - the node to add
        Returns:
        the builder

      • createNode

        StyledNode createNode(String xpathLocator,
                      String... classNames)
        Crate a StyledNode associated to the given CSS class names. This node refers a DOMNode addressed by xpath.
        Parameters:
        xpathLocator - the expression locating one DOMNode in the current page.
        classNames - list of CSS class names for the created node
        Returns:
        a new StyledNode, not attached to the StyledOverlay being build
